meanings.definition: To come together at a prearranged time and place.
meanings.sent1: The friends rendezvoused at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The team rendezvoused before the game to discuss strategy.
meanings.sent3: The cats rendezvoused by the food bowl, planning their next move.
meanings.sent4: The stars rendezvoused in the night sky, creating a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The students rendezvoused in the library, eager to study together.

meanings.definition: A meeting at a prearranged time and place.
meanings.sent1: The annual family rendezvous was held at the beach this year.
meanings.sent2: The diplomatic rendezvous brought leaders from different countries together.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's rendezvous at the bird feeder caused quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The old house became a rendezvous for ghosts on Halloween night.
meanings.sent5: The secret rendezvous in the garden was full of whispered conversations.
